Title: Adamawa govt orders free medical treatment for victims of Lamurde clash
Summary: Adamawa govt orders free medical treatment for victims of communal clash in Lamurde Local Government Area (LGA) of Adamawa State . The pain of the recent communal clash is slowly giving way to hope . This was lucidly observed by The Guardian when the state government issued the order .

Title: FG moves to tighten monitoring of N4.7tr constituency projects

Title: Why civil servants are barred from operating businesses, foreign accounts – CCB

Title: Nigeria’s middle class slipping into poverty
Summary: For decades, Nigeria’s middle class symbolised stability, aspiration and economic balance . Today that sense of security is rapidly slipping away . Rising inflation, weak purchasing power and soaring living costs are pushing millions of middle-income Nigerians toward poverty .

Title: Soludo to dualise key Onitsha roads
Summary: Anambra State governor, Prof. Chukwuma Soludo, has announced plans to commence the dualisation of 3-3, Nkisi and Nkwelle roads in Onitsha . The governor described the traffic situation as “unacceptable” and said his administration is determined to bring it to an end .

Title: [VIDEO] AFCON: Uzoho arrives as Super Eagles open camp in Egypt

Coaches and backroom staff have also settled in as the team begins its build-up to the tournament in Morocco .
